messages.subject: Tapes from HSC conference for sale!
messages.msgSnippet: I hope this comes out legibly! I ve listened to the four I was in on and they all came out clearly and seem good and  useful! I will have some tapes with me in
messages.messageBody:
I hope this comes out legibly!
I've listened to the four I was in on and they all came out clearly and seem
good and useful!

I will have some tapes with me in Texas and South Carolina when I go there in
October, but for other people or those in a hurry, here's this.

I won't be speaking from the same notes (I try not to) for either of those,
so it won't be a direct repeat, although I'm always on that unschooling
topic...

Sandra
